description: Acting Navy Secretary Thomas Modly resigned on Tuesday, a day after leaked audio revealed he called the ousted commander of the USS Theodore Roosevelt "stupid" in an address to the ship's crew, Defense Secretary Mark Esper confirmed Tuesday.
title: READ: Defense Secretary Mark Esper confirms resignation of acting Navy Secretary Thomas Modly
title_page: READ: Defense Secretary Mark Esper confirms resignation of acting Navy Secretary Thomas Modly - CNNPolitics
maintext: (CNN) Acting Navy Secretary Thomas Modly resigned on Tuesday, a day after leaked audio revealed he called the ousted commander of the USS Theodore Roosevelt "stupid" in an address to the ship's crew, Defense Secretary Mark Esper confirmed Tuesday.
